page.title: 18Andoversford-School
page.content: Andoversford school is in the village along the Old Gloucester Road.It was built fifty years ago in 1933.There are 150 pupils who live in surrounding areas.There are four full time teachers and one part time teacher. Many of the pupils at the school did not mind going because they can see their friends at playtime.In the games lessons thet also have a lot of freedom. Even though the school is in the country the pupils do not do much work outside. The pupils thought that there were many advantages of the school because it is nearer and smaller but with a large play area.
